name: phonebook_backend
description: A backend for a phonebook app

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phone-book && rm -rf build && npm run build && cp -r build ../phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:git: git add . && git commit -m autobuild && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy:git && npm run deploy:heroku

author: Ibrahim Salman
